name: The Passage (El fideo rubio)
description:
The Passage, throughout the night weep the souls of those pulled astray from the current.

will you save them from their endless peril?
or leave them to drift for eternity ?

Controls:

  • Press [ E ] to talk to the spirits ( You have to be withing a small radius)
  • Press [ R ]to reset your location and rotation in case you get stuck
  • Press  [Esc] to pause the game 
  • [ WASD ] To move.
